name: Bedlam Brawl Fantasy MMORPG
blurb: A casual social 2D MMORPG for iPhone/iPad. Guild wars, high fantasy world, endless loot, crafting. Diablo meets MUDs on iOS.

rewards.reward: A subscription to all Bedlam Brawl digital promo materials, including several desktop and mobile wallpapers.
50 Karma (special in-game currency) you can spend on any consumable or karma-only equipment.
